member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_OUTPUT_VIEW_DESC
member.summary: Describes a video processor output view.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_OUTPUT_VIEW_DESC.ViewDimension
member.summary: The resource type of the view, specified as a member of the enumeration.

summary.para: A structure that identifies the texture resource for the output view.
Use this member of the union when ViewDimension equals D3D11_VPOV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE2D.
A structure that identifies the texture array for the output view.
Use this member of the union when ViewDimension equals D3D11_VPOV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE2DARRAY.
